Author: PartyTimeSexyDisco
Text: It's most likely food weight and water retention, dw! Stay hydrated and it should go away within a day or two tops ❤️

Author: Soleska
Text: Pizza is high in sodium und sodium binds to water. So you probably gained a ton of water weight (+ your body does that during and before your period too).  Please don't take laxatives! Try moving a bit, stay hydrated and if you're feeling especially bad, don't eat more sodium and opt for fruit!
